item.title: Fast Ethernet as a DS3 Upgrade
item.description: Businesses that need more bandwidth than a T1 line provides have historically opted for DS3 service, which offers 45 Mbps. This high-speed digital connection typically runs on a SONET fiber optic circuit, with the final connection to the customer’s location installed and maintained by the local phone company. DS3 is fast, very reliable, and more affordable than ever before. However, there’s a new contender â€“ Fast Ethernet. Fast Ethernet is a standard Ethernet LAN speed that delivers 100 Mbps.
